doc.field: GTE GTE> UNIT GETS CONTRACT FOR PRODUCTS

GTE Corp said its Fiber Optic Products division was awarded a 250,000 dlr minimum contract by NYNEX Corp's NYN> Enterprise Co. The bulk of the agreement applies to GTE's elastomeric glass tube splice products, the company said, as well as other fiber optic components, including GTE's recently-introduced cleaving tool and installation kit. Reuter
